events.title: Local Dev Meetup
events.description: Join us for a fun and interactive local developer meetup where we discuss latest web technologies and network with fellow developers.

events.title: Practice Hackathon
events.description: A 24-hour online hackathon to practice building cool projects with friends and meet new collaborators.

events.title: Next.js Study Group
events.description: Weekly Next.js study group to go through tutorials, share tips, and build small projects together.

events.title: React Workshop
events.description: Hands-on React workshop for beginners and intermediate developers to build real-world projects.

events.title: Frontend Conference 2025
events.description: Annual frontend development conference with talks, networking, and coding sessions.
